name: Grey Scaled
description:
Grey Scaled is a short, monochromatic indie game in which you play as the rookie explorer: Jay Talonfoot. Your mission is to explore some abandoned ruins within a cave to find some valuable gems that are located inside. Fight your way through the cave dwelling enemies in order to make it out alive!

Controls:
A - Left | D - Right | W - Jump/Enter Doors | Left-Click - Swing

Abilities:

You can cling to ledges if you jump next to them, use this to navigate around better.

After you die, Jay's special powers allow him to walk around or a short time after death, use this to try and get a sneak peek at what might be next in a level, or to get revenge against an enemy that killed you.

Jumping and swinging are both viable ways to kill enemies, but it way not work on tougher enemies that lurk in the dark.

Credits:

Most of the Game(Sprites, Code, Characters, Lore, etc): CadenYay (me)

Main Character Design (not the sprite): SlippySteps

Some Sprites/Code: Matt Burton
